mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bh_user_subscription (user_id, subscription_product_id, purchase_date, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subscriptionProductId}, #{purchaseDate}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: select usersub.id, usersub.user_id, product.sp_id, product.prodName, product.price, product.period, usersub.start_date, usersub.end_date, usersub.refund_yn, usersub.purchase_date from BH_USER_SUBSCRIPTION as usersub left join BH_SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT as product on product.sp_id = usersub.SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT_ID WHERE LOWER(usersub.user_id) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{userId}),'%') LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
